content: such a cute little sleeveless top knitted all-in-one from the top down with no sewing up ideal for newborn or premature babies and perfect for dolls too requires ~ dk yarn 8ply 4mm needles 4 or 5 small buttons very quick & easy to knit extra-small premature small premature medium premature large premature 0-3months **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
